cd /usr/local/cuda/include

(A)
sudo ln -s math_functions.h math_functions.hpp

(B)
sudo ln -s /usr/local/cuda/include/crt/math_functions.hpp math_functions.hpp

bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda --cxxopt="-I/opt/cuda/include/crt" //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

cd /usr/local/cuda/include

There are two solutions:
(A)
sudo ln -s math_functions.h math_functions.hpp

(B)
sudo ln  -s  /usr/local/cuda/include/crt/math_functions.hpp math_functions.hpp 

(C)  As svenstaro suggested:

bazel build  --config=opt --config=cuda  --cxxopt="-I/opt/cuda/include/crt"    //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

 choice(B) : Build completed successfully

But,  choice (C) is much better than (A) and (B)
